definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委託巴克萊幫助他們全球尋找買主。

sentences.english: Medical service contract is a kind of contract for commission.
sentences.chinese: 醫療服務合同具有委託合同的基本屬性。

sentences.english: He entrusted his child to a faithful friend.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的孩子委託給一位忠實的朋友照料。

sentences.english: As long as the two sorts of rights are separated, the principal-agency relationships exist.
sentences.chinese: 只要存在兩權分離，就有可能存在委託代理關係。

sentences.english: KCGMH was commissioned by the Kaohsiung County Government to administer the Fengshan Hospital of Kaohsiung County.
sentences.chinese: 本院接受高雄縣政府委託經營高雄縣立鳳山醫院。

sentences.english: There are limits and acceptable behavior that surround the exercise of delegated authority.
sentences.chinese: 存在圍繞實行委託權力的限制和可接受的行爲。

sentences.english: ASC entrusts its sub-institutes and local chapters to assist for admitting members and practises dependency administration.
sentences.chinese: 本會委託地方學會協助發展會員，並實行屬地管理。

sentences.english: The principal Li Gongyan to enter the room her husband.
sentences.chinese: 委託人李紅妍進入丈夫出軌現場房間的瞬間。

sentences.english: We thank you for your consideration in making us the consignment of 30 bales of cotton goods.
sentences.chinese: 貴方欲委託敝公司銷售棉織品30包，我方不勝感激。

sentences.english: I'm talking about how you work as a client for a project that needs to make something.
sentences.chinese: 我說的是你如何成功扮演一位要達成某專案的委託人。

sentences.english: I imagined, therefore, that it was she who was to be deputed to beat me.
sentences.chinese: 我也因此認爲她是被委託來揍我的。

sentences.english: I have also asked some people to help me with opening and closing the church and the gates for parking.
sentences.chinese: 我已經委託了一些教友幫忙打點聖堂和泊車閘門開關。

sentences.english: I. You are approved to launch the inter-bank entrusted loans business with financial institutions.
sentences.chinese: 同意你行開辦金融機構同業委託貸款業務。

sentences.english: We have commissioned a full external investigation being led by an independent paediatric doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經委託其他獨立的兒科醫生進行全面的調查。

sentences.english: You can commission them to paint something especially for you.
sentences.chinese: 你可以委託他們專門爲你畫點什麼。

sentences.english: The artist was commissioned to paint a portrait of the president.
sentences.chinese: 這位畫家受委託畫一幅總統的肖象。

definition: to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
